about_the_game:
DEMO VERSION of Super Gosu Cars™ contains:
  • 5 vehicles
  • 8 characters
  • 2 tracks
  • 1 cup.
  • All game modes (Time Trial, Grand Prix, Custom Tournament) are available.
  • Local multiplayer up to 8 players.



FULL VERSION of Super Gosu Cars™ (early access included) contains:
  • All vehicles
  • All characters
  • All tracks
  • All Grand Prix cups

Action Racing - Super Gosu Cars is an arcade style racing game with kart racing crazyness!

Personality and Style - Choose your vehicle and driver and put the pedal to the metal!

Items - Pick up and use items to devastate the competition as you claw your way to victory!

Multiplayer Mayhem - Up to 4 players in splitscreen and up to 8 players in top-down view!

Feeling of Accomplishment - Unlock additional vehicles, drivers and more as you progress! (Note: Unlocking is not possible in the demo version.)

Game Modes

  • Grand Prix: 8 racers compete in a variety of cups; each with their own set of challenges.
  • Time Trial: Hone your driving skills while racing against the clock (single player).
  • Custom Tournament Pick and choose your own set of tracks, rules, and more.

Features

  • Up to 8 players in local multiplayer (requires 8 separate gamepads).
  • CPU controlled opponents (in Grand Prix and Custom Tournament).
  • 12 colorful tracks in various engaging environments.
  • 8+ vehicles with different stats and aesthetics.
  • 8+ drivers to put to the test behind the wheel.

name: Super Gosu Cars Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 Graphics / Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Arcade racing action combined with kart racing combat! Play up to 8 friends in local multiplayer! Five different vehicles, eight drivers, two tracks and one grand prix cup to try out in this demo version! Three game modes: Grand Prix, Time Trial and Custom Tournament.
